<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function getfeatures(id,mp,yextTagId, listingNumber) {
var hc = false;
var inx = 0;
var yextTagDivArray = $("div[id=yext-tag" + yextTagId+"]");
//var yextag = $("#yext-tag" + id).clone();
var yextag = $(yextTagDivArray[0]).clone();
var features = $("<div class='coupons'></div>");
if(id != 0){
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1){
var morefeat = $("#mofe" + id).clone();
features = $(features).append($("#fl" + id).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon" + id) || $(this).is("#of" + id))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){ $("#dmf" + id).remove(); }
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
}else{
/* when pinTag value is not available for a listing,
at that mofe and f1 div is not renedering with proper id in listingpage.links.jsf.
For that reason it's require to retrieve mofe and f1 div as a children of mpbtm div.
*/
var morefeat = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#mofe");
var fl = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#fl");
features = $(features).append($(fl).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon") || $(this).is("#of"))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){
$("#dmf" + (listingNumber+1)).remove();
}
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
if(yextag){
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("margin","4px 0 0 0");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("float","left");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("display","block");
$(".yextall",yextag).css("display","none");
$(".yexttrim",yextag).css("display","block");
$(yextag.html()).prependTo($(features));
}
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1 || yextag){
return features.html();
} else {
return;
}
}
function gbplc(id) {
//console.log("enter gbplc id: " + id);
var fltp = 2;
var clone = $(".pin" + id).clone();
if (clone) {
var text = $('.detailName',clone).text();
var charsLength = text.length;
var adds = $(".address",clone).html();
var moreInfo = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('onclick');
var mInfohref = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('href');
$(".listResults",clone).after("<div class='addressDetails'>"+adds+"</div>");
$(".vlst",clone).after("<p style='float:left;padding-top:15px;clear:both'><a onclick='"+moreInfo+"'" + " href='"+mInfohref+"'>More Info</a></p>");
//console.info(adds);
$(".address",clone).remove();
$(".yext-tag",clone).remove();
$("#reviewimagediv",clone).remove();
$(".reviewtext1",clone).remove();
$(".links",clone).remove();
$(".icons",clone).remove();
$(".business-text",clone).remove();
$(".phone",clone).remove();
$(".listingNumber",clone).remove();
var bush = $('.detailName',clone).width();
var addh = $('.address',clone).outerHeight();
var rewh = (bush + addh) + 2;
$(".addressDetails",clone).css("top", bush + "px");
$("#flyoutDiv .reviews",clone).css("top", rewh + "px");
}
var clnHtml = clone.html();
//console.log("clnHtml: " + clnHtml);
var trackingAttrWithMap = 'data-track=\'{\"inmap\":\"true\",';
if ($.browser.msie) {
var trackingAttr = new RegExp('data-track=\'{', 'g');
clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(trackingAttr, trackingAttrWithMap);
}
else {
var addMapIndEnd = '}\'';
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/data-track=\"{/g,trackingAttrWithMap);
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/}\"/g,addMapIndEnd);
}
return fltp + "spFlyoutType" + "<section class=\"listings\" style=\"width:auto;padding-bottom:0px;margin-bottom:0px;\"><article style=\"padding:0px;border-bottom:none;\">"+clnHtml + "</article></section>";
}
function hlListing(n) {
var a = document.getElementsByTagName("article");
for (var i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
var e = $(".atlist" + i);
if (e) {
if (n == i){
e.css("background-color","#DBEBF2");
} else {
e.css("background-color","");
}
}
}
}

$(this).attr("href", nwurl);
}

<script type="text/javascript">
function logBPClick(bidClickUrl, clickBase)
{
if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
} else {
tsrc = clickBase + bidClickUrl;
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
}
function timebplogClick(t) {
var img = new Image();
img.src = t;
}

function verifySimple(f) {
if(f == null) {
f = document.ypform;
}
if(f.C) {
var keywd = f.C.value;
keywd = keywd.replace( /^\s+/g, "" );
keywd = keywd.replace( /\s+$/g, "" );
if(f.N == null && (keywd == "" || keywd == "Required field") || keywd == "Find local businesses e.g. hotels, Dallas TX") {

f.C.style.color = "red";
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
}
if ((f.C && f.N) && (f.C.value == "" && f.N.value == "")) {
alert("Please enter a Keyword or a Business Name.");
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
return true;

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}

}

resizeSearch();
});

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function distLink () {
var rr=document.distance.RR.value;
var ppvalue = '';
if (rr == '0'){
ppvalue = "&PP=L";
}
var rrvalue = '';
if (rr != 'AA'){ rrvalue = '&local=on&RR='+rr; }
var urlaa='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&MCBP=true&F=1';
// Generate a distance sort link:
var url='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&EG=1&MCBP=true&OO=1&F=1'+rrvalue+ppvalue;
if (rr == 'AA'){ document.location.href=urlaa; } else{ document.location.href=url;}
}
</script>

$( ".more").click(function () {
if ( $( "#categorymodal" ).is( ":hidden" ) ) {
$( "#categorymodal" ).slideDown( "fast" );
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
$("#changecity").hide();
} else {
$( "#categorymodal" ).hide();
}
});

if ($("#categorymodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#categorymodal").hide();
}
if ($("#nhoodmodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
}
});
$(".changecityStyle").click(function () {
if ($("#categorymodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#categorymodal").hide();
}
if ($("#nhoodmodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
}
});

(so user can move back and forth between pages and not have to keep
clicking phone again to see one already opened)
*/
function logClick(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker)
{
logClick(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker,'');
}
function logClick(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker,adOrCampaign)
{
var img = new Image();
var d = new Date();
var adLog = adOrCampaign == 'AD' ? "http://mpclicks.superpages.com/ct?SRC=&TGT=SP&PN=7&T=Santa+Maria&S=CA&C=beauty+salons&PGID=yp603.8081.1433039383101.1401702508210&TRS=nbt&ACT=log,red": "http://clicks.superpages.com/ct/clickThrough?SRC=&target=SP&PN=7&FP=listings&T=Santa+Maria&S=CA&Z=93455&C=beauty+salons&PGID=yp603.8081.1433039383101.1401702508210&ALG=113&TS=nbt&OF=1&ACTION=log,red";
var s_clickBase = adLog + "&FL=listings&TL=" + clickType + listingClickInfo + "&LOC=";
if ( clkTracker != '' && clkTracker != null )
{
tsrc = s_clickBase + clkTracker;
// alert("In the 0 pixel image tracking condition");
}
else if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = s_clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
//alert("In the 1 pixel image tracking condition");
} else {
//alert("In the bidClick tracking function");
tsrc = s_clickBase + bidClickUrl;
}
setTimeout("timelogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
function yellowpagesClick(u,lt) {
var img = new Image();
var clickLoc = u + "&" + lt;
img.src = clickLoc;
}

}

$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg8");
}
if(rand==10){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg9");
rand=0;
}
}
});
if ($.cookie("mapsize") == 'small') {
for( i=1; i <= 3; i++){
$("#dmf" + i).css("display","none");
}
}</script>
<script language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>
<!--
var itemIDNumber=0;
var itemFL="FL=top";
// multiple links on the page may the same overlay div.
// these functions display/hide the overlay in a position relative to the links
// (the links are moreN and lessN, where N is itemNumber)
// and hide or show those links as appropriate
// we also sets up logging, so we can distinguish clicks on different links (by fl param)
function showListingsOverlay(itemNumber, fl)
{
// since we have a link to display this in multiple places, a user may scroll around
// and click from multiple places. so if overlay was already displayed - hide it and reset the link to display it
hideListingsOverlay();
// these two vars are defined above and are set here for use in closing!
itemIDNumber=itemNumber;
itemFL=fl;
var ref = document.getElementById('less'+itemIDNumber);
var div = document.getElementById('listingsOverlay');
// if we are at the top, display overlay just below the link
if (itemFL=='FL=top')
moveElement(div, ref, 20);
else {
// this is the link at the bottom, get the height and place the overlay just above the link
var myHeight = 40;
if (div.currentStyle) { //ie way
myHeight = div.offsetHeight;
}
if (window.getComputedStyle) { //mozilla way
var myElementCS = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(div, null);
myHeight = parseInt(myElementCS.getPropertyValue('height'));
}
moveElement(div, ref, -(myHeight));
}
overlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('less'+itemIDNumber);
showform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
}
function hideListingsOverlay()
{
hideoverlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
showform('less'+itemIDNumber);
}
function moveElement(el, ref, topOff)
{
var referTop = ref.offsetTop;
var tempRef = ref;
while(tempRef.offsetParent){
tempRef = tempRef.offsetParent;
referTop += tempRef.offsetTop;
}
el.style.top = referTop + topOff;
}
// change the logging params to reflect which link was clicked
function setFL(href)
{
return href.replace("FL=top", itemFL);
}
// -->
</script>
<a href="#" class="back-to-top"></a>
<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function BrowserCheck() {
var b = navigator.appName;
if (b == "Netscape") this.b = "NS";
else if (b == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") this.b = "IE";
else this.b = b;
this.v = parseInt(navigator.appVersion);
this.NS = (this.b == "NS" && this.v>=4);
this.NS4 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 4);
this.NS5 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 5);
this.IE = (this.b == "IE" && this.v>=4);
this.IE4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 4')>0);
this.IE5 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 5')>0);
if (this.IE5 || this.NS5) this.VER5 = true;
if (this.IE4 || this.NS4) this.VER4 = true;
this.OLD = (! this.VER5 && ! this.VER4) ? true : false;
this.min = (this.NS||this.IE);
}
is = new BrowserCheck();
alertBox = (is.VER5) ? document.getElementById("alertLayer").style
: (is.NS) ? document.layers["alertLayer"]
: document.all["alertLayer"].style;
$(document).ready(function() {
if (mapable==true){
$("#myMap").css("position", "relative");
$("#myMap").css('border-bottom', '6px solid #677580');
}else{
$("#myMap").css("position", "absolute");
$("#myMap").css('border', 0 +'px');
}
var offset = 220;
var duration = 10;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
} else {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
}
});
jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
jQuery('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
return false;
})
});
function concatState(str) {
var res = str.substring(0, str.indexOf(',')).replace('<h2','<div').replace('</h2>','</div>');
  return res;
}
var city = $("#cityState").html();
var search = $("#catid").html()
document.getElementById("cityonly").innerHTML = concatState(city)+ " ";
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function getfeatures(id,mp,yextTagId, listingNumber) {
var hc = false;
var inx = 0;
var yextTagDivArray = $("div[id=yext-tag" + yextTagId+"]");
//var yextag = $("#yext-tag" + id).clone();
var yextag = $(yextTagDivArray[0]).clone();
var features = $("<div class='coupons'></div>");
if(id != 0){
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1){
var morefeat = $("#mofe" + id).clone();
features = $(features).append($("#fl" + id).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon" + id) || $(this).is("#of" + id))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){ $("#dmf" + id).remove(); }
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
}else{
/* when pinTag value is not available for a listing,
at that mofe and f1 div is not renedering with proper id in listingpage.links.jsf.
For that reason it's require to retrieve mofe and f1 div as a children of mpbtm div.
*/
var morefeat = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#mofe");
var fl = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#fl");
features = $(features).append($(fl).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon") || $(this).is("#of"))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){
$("#dmf" + (listingNumber+1)).remove();
}
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
if(yextag){
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("margin","4px 0 0 0");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("float","left");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("display","block");
$(".yextall",yextag).css("display","none");
$(".yexttrim",yextag).css("display","block");
$(yextag.html()).prependTo($(features));
}
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1 || yextag){
return features.html();
} else {
return;
}
}
function gbplc(id) {
//console.log("enter gbplc id: " + id);
var fltp = 2;
var clone = $(".pin" + id).clone();
if (clone) {
var text = $('.detailName',clone).text();
var charsLength = text.length;
var adds = $(".address",clone).html();
var moreInfo = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('onclick');
var mInfohref = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('href');
$(".listResults",clone).after("<div class='addressDetails'>"+adds+"</div>");
$(".vlst",clone).after("<p style='float:left;padding-top:15px;clear:both'><a onclick='"+moreInfo+"'" + " href='"+mInfohref+"'>More Info</a></p>");
//console.info(adds);
$(".address",clone).remove();
$(".yext-tag",clone).remove();
$("#reviewimagediv",clone).remove();
$(".reviewtext1",clone).remove();
$(".links",clone).remove();
$(".icons",clone).remove();
$(".business-text",clone).remove();
$(".phone",clone).remove();
$(".listingNumber",clone).remove();
var bush = $('.detailName',clone).width();
var addh = $('.address',clone).outerHeight();
var rewh = (bush + addh) + 2;
$(".addressDetails",clone).css("top", bush + "px");
$("#flyoutDiv .reviews",clone).css("top", rewh + "px");
}
var clnHtml = clone.html();
//console.log("clnHtml: " + clnHtml);
var trackingAttrWithMap = 'data-track=\'{\"inmap\":\"true\",';
if ($.browser.msie) {
var trackingAttr = new RegExp('data-track=\'{', 'g');
clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(trackingAttr, trackingAttrWithMap);
}
else {
var addMapIndEnd = '}\'';
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/data-track=\"{/g,trackingAttrWithMap);
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/}\"/g,addMapIndEnd);
}
return fltp + "spFlyoutType" + "<section class=\"listings\" style=\"width:auto;padding-bottom:0px;margin-bottom:0px;\"><article style=\"padding:0px;border-bottom:none;\">"+clnHtml + "</article></section>";
}
function hlListing(n) {
var a = document.getElementsByTagName("article");
for (var i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
var e = $(".atlist" + i);
if (e) {
if (n == i){
e.css("background-color","#DBEBF2");
} else {
e.css("background-color","");
}
}
}
}

function distLink () {
var rr=document.distance.RR.value;
var ppvalue = '';
if (rr == '0'){
ppvalue = "&PP=L";
}
var rrvalue = '';
if (rr != 'AA'){ rrvalue = '&local=on&RR='+rr; }
var urlaa='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&MCBP=true&F=1';
// Generate a distance sort link:
var url='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&EG=1&MCBP=true&OO=1&F=1'+rrvalue+ppvalue;
if (rr == 'AA'){ document.location.href=urlaa; } else{ document.location.href=url;}
}
</script>

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
<!--
/* this is a list of phones that have been displayed in this session
(so user can move back and forth between pages and not have to keep
clicking phone again to see one already opened)
*/
function logClick(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker)
{
logClick(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker,'');
}
function logClick(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker,adOrCampaign)
{
var img = new Image();
var d = new Date();
var adLog = adOrCampaign == 'AD' ? "http://mpclicks.superpages.com/ct?SRC=&TGT=SP&PN=8&T=Santa+Maria&S=CA&C=beauty+salons&PGID=yp608.8081.1433039385366.147917839791&TRS=nbt&ACT=log,red": "http://clicks.superpages.com/ct/clickThrough?SRC=&target=SP&PN=8&FP=listings&T=Santa+Maria&S=CA&Z=93455&C=beauty+salons&PGID=yp608.8081.1433039385366.147917839791&ALG=113&TS=nbt&OF=1&ACTION=log,red";
var s_clickBase = adLog + "&FL=listings&TL=" + clickType + listingClickInfo + "&LOC=";
if ( clkTracker != '' && clkTracker != null )
{
tsrc = s_clickBase + clkTracker;
// alert("In the 0 pixel image tracking condition");
}
else if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = s_clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
//alert("In the 1 pixel image tracking condition");
} else {
//alert("In the bidClick tracking function");
tsrc = s_clickBase + bidClickUrl;
}
setTimeout("timelogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
function yellowpagesClick(u,lt) {
var img = new Image();
var clickLoc = u + "&" + lt;
img.src = clickLoc;
}
function logClick_se(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker)
{
var img = new Image();
var d = new Date();
var s_clickBase = "http://clicks.superpages.com/ct/clickThrough?SRC=&target=SP&PN=8&FP=listings&T=Santa+Maria&S=CA&Z=93455&C=beauty+salons&PGID=yp608.8081.1433039385366.147917839791&ALG=113&TS=nbt&OF=1&ACTION=log,red&FL=listings&TL=" + clickType + listingClickInfo + "&LOC=";
if ( clkTracker != '' && clkTracker != null )
{
tsrc = s_clickBase + clkTracker;
// alert("In the 0 pixel image tracking condition");
}
else if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = s_clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
//alert("In the 1 pixel image tracking condition");
} else {
//alert("In the bidClick tracking function");
tsrc = s_clickBase + bidClickUrl;
}
setTimeout("timelogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
// -->
</script>

<script language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>
<!--
var itemIDNumber=0;
var itemFL="FL=top";
// multiple links on the page may the same overlay div.
// these functions display/hide the overlay in a position relative to the links
// (the links are moreN and lessN, where N is itemNumber)
// and hide or show those links as appropriate
// we also sets up logging, so we can distinguish clicks on different links (by fl param)
function showListingsOverlay(itemNumber, fl)
{
// since we have a link to display this in multiple places, a user may scroll around
// and click from multiple places. so if overlay was already displayed - hide it and reset the link to display it
hideListingsOverlay();
// these two vars are defined above and are set here for use in closing!
itemIDNumber=itemNumber;
itemFL=fl;
var ref = document.getElementById('less'+itemIDNumber);
var div = document.getElementById('listingsOverlay');
// if we are at the top, display overlay just below the link
if (itemFL=='FL=top')
moveElement(div, ref, 20);
else {
// this is the link at the bottom, get the height and place the overlay just above the link
var myHeight = 40;
if (div.currentStyle) { //ie way
myHeight = div.offsetHeight;
}
if (window.getComputedStyle) { //mozilla way
var myElementCS = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(div, null);
myHeight = parseInt(myElementCS.getPropertyValue('height'));
}
moveElement(div, ref, -(myHeight));
}
overlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('less'+itemIDNumber);
showform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
}
function hideListingsOverlay()
{
hideoverlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
showform('less'+itemIDNumber);
}
function moveElement(el, ref, topOff)
{
var referTop = ref.offsetTop;
var tempRef = ref;
while(tempRef.offsetParent){
tempRef = tempRef.offsetParent;
referTop += tempRef.offsetTop;
}
el.style.top = referTop + topOff;
}
// change the logging params to reflect which link was clicked
function setFL(href)
{
return href.replace("FL=top", itemFL);
}
// -->
</script>

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function BrowserCheck() {
var b = navigator.appName;
if (b == "Netscape") this.b = "NS";
else if (b == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") this.b = "IE";
else this.b = b;
this.v = parseInt(navigator.appVersion);
this.NS = (this.b == "NS" && this.v>=4);
this.NS4 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 4);
this.NS5 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 5);
this.IE = (this.b == "IE" && this.v>=4);
this.IE4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 4')>0);
this.IE5 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 5')>0);
if (this.IE5 || this.NS5) this.VER5 = true;
if (this.IE4 || this.NS4) this.VER4 = true;
this.OLD = (! this.VER5 && ! this.VER4) ? true : false;
this.min = (this.NS||this.IE);
}
is = new BrowserCheck();
alertBox = (is.VER5) ? document.getElementById("alertLayer").style
: (is.NS) ? document.layers["alertLayer"]
: document.all["alertLayer"].style;
$(document).ready(function() {
if (mapable==true){
$("#myMap").css("position", "relative");
$("#myMap").css('border-bottom', '6px solid #677580');
}else{
$("#myMap").css("position", "absolute");
$("#myMap").css('border', 0 +'px');
}
var offset = 220;
var duration = 10;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
} else {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
}
});
jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
jQuery('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
return false;
})
});
function concatState(str) {
var res = str.substring(0, str.indexOf(',')).replace('<h2','<div').replace('</h2>','</div>');
  return res;
}
var city = $("#cityState").html();
var search = $("#catid").html()
document.getElementById("cityonly").innerHTML = concatState(city)+ " ";
</script>

$( ".hidefilters" ).click(function() {
if(document.getElementById("hf").innerHTML =='Hide Filters'){
document.getElementById("hf").innerHTML = 'Sort Filters'
}
else{
document.getElementById("hf").innerHTML = 'Hide Filters'}
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function getfeatures(id,mp,yextTagId, listingNumber) {
var hc = false;
var inx = 0;
var yextTagDivArray = $("div[id=yext-tag" + yextTagId+"]");
//var yextag = $("#yext-tag" + id).clone();
var yextag = $(yextTagDivArray[0]).clone();
var features = $("<div class='coupons'></div>");
if(id != 0){
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1){
var morefeat = $("#mofe" + id).clone();
features = $(features).append($("#fl" + id).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon" + id) || $(this).is("#of" + id))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){ $("#dmf" + id).remove(); }
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
}else{
/* when pinTag value is not available for a listing,
at that mofe and f1 div is not renedering with proper id in listingpage.links.jsf.
For that reason it's require to retrieve mofe and f1 div as a children of mpbtm div.
*/
var morefeat = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#mofe");
var fl = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#fl");
features = $(features).append($(fl).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon") || $(this).is("#of"))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){
$("#dmf" + (listingNumber+1)).remove();
}
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
if(yextag){
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("margin","4px 0 0 0");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("float","left");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("display","block");
$(".yextall",yextag).css("display","none");
$(".yexttrim",yextag).css("display","block");
$(yextag.html()).prependTo($(features));
}
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1 || yextag){
return features.html();
} else {
return;
}
}
function gbplc(id) {
//console.log("enter gbplc id: " + id);
var fltp = 2;
var clone = $(".pin" + id).clone();
if (clone) {
var text = $('.detailName',clone).text();
var charsLength = text.length;
var adds = $(".address",clone).html();
var moreInfo = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('onclick');
var mInfohref = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('href');
$(".listResults",clone).after("<div class='addressDetails'>"+adds+"</div>");
$(".vlst",clone).after("<p style='float:left;padding-top:15px;clear:both'><a onclick='"+moreInfo+"'" + " href='"+mInfohref+"'>More Info</a></p>");
//console.info(adds);
$(".address",clone).remove();
$(".yext-tag",clone).remove();
$("#reviewimagediv",clone).remove();
$(".reviewtext1",clone).remove();
$(".links",clone).remove();
$(".icons",clone).remove();
$(".business-text",clone).remove();
$(".phone",clone).remove();
$(".listingNumber",clone).remove();
var bush = $('.detailName',clone).width();
var addh = $('.address',clone).outerHeight();
var rewh = (bush + addh) + 2;
$(".addressDetails",clone).css("top", bush + "px");
$("#flyoutDiv .reviews",clone).css("top", rewh + "px");
}
var clnHtml = clone.html();
//console.log("clnHtml: " + clnHtml);
var trackingAttrWithMap = 'data-track=\'{\"inmap\":\"true\",';
if ($.browser.msie) {
var trackingAttr = new RegExp('data-track=\'{', 'g');
clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(trackingAttr, trackingAttrWithMap);
}
else {
var addMapIndEnd = '}\'';
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/data-track=\"{/g,trackingAttrWithMap);
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/}\"/g,addMapIndEnd);
}
return fltp + "spFlyoutType" + "<section class=\"listings\" style=\"width:auto;padding-bottom:0px;margin-bottom:0px;\"><article style=\"padding:0px;border-bottom:none;\">"+clnHtml + "</article></section>";
}
function hlListing(n) {
var a = document.getElementsByTagName("article");
for (var i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
var e = $(".atlist" + i);
if (e) {
if (n == i){
e.css("background-color","#DBEBF2");
} else {
e.css("background-color","");
}
}
}
}
$(document).ready( function() {
$(".pager a").click( function(e) {
s.prop41="Listing Results:Sort by:Pagination";
});
$("h3 a").rightClick( function(e) {
var nwurl = $("#rcurl" + $(this).attr('id')).attr("title");
if(nwurl!=null && nwurl!="null"){
$(this).attr("href", nwurl);
}
});
});
function loadMap(){
GetMap();
}

{

}
}

}

function distLink () {
var rr=document.distance.RR.value;
var ppvalue = '';
if (rr == '0'){
ppvalue = "&PP=L";
}
var rrvalue = '';
if (rr != 'AA'){ rrvalue = '&local=on&RR='+rr; }
var urlaa='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&MCBP=true&F=1';
// Generate a distance sort link:
var url='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&EG=1&MCBP=true&OO=1&F=1'+rrvalue+ppvalue;
if (rr == 'AA'){ document.location.href=urlaa; } else{ document.location.href=url;}
}
</script>

$( ".clear" ).each(function( i ) {
if($(this).find('.product').length >0){
$(this).css("background-color", "#e4e8e9");
$(this).css("margin-top", "4px");
}
});
</script>
</div>
</article>

<script language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>
<!--
var itemIDNumber=0;
var itemFL="FL=top";
// multiple links on the page may the same overlay div.
// these functions display/hide the overlay in a position relative to the links
// (the links are moreN and lessN, where N is itemNumber)
// and hide or show those links as appropriate
// we also sets up logging, so we can distinguish clicks on different links (by fl param)
function showListingsOverlay(itemNumber, fl)
{
// since we have a link to display this in multiple places, a user may scroll around
// and click from multiple places. so if overlay was already displayed - hide it and reset the link to display it
hideListingsOverlay();
// these two vars are defined above and are set here for use in closing!
itemIDNumber=itemNumber;
itemFL=fl;
var ref = document.getElementById('less'+itemIDNumber);
var div = document.getElementById('listingsOverlay');
// if we are at the top, display overlay just below the link
if (itemFL=='FL=top')
moveElement(div, ref, 20);
else {
// this is the link at the bottom, get the height and place the overlay just above the link
var myHeight = 40;
if (div.currentStyle) { //ie way
myHeight = div.offsetHeight;
}
if (window.getComputedStyle) { //mozilla way
var myElementCS = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(div, null);
myHeight = parseInt(myElementCS.getPropertyValue('height'));
}
moveElement(div, ref, -(myHeight));
}
overlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('less'+itemIDNumber);
showform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
}
function hideListingsOverlay()
{
hideoverlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
showform('less'+itemIDNumber);
}
function moveElement(el, ref, topOff)
{
var referTop = ref.offsetTop;
var tempRef = ref;
while(tempRef.offsetParent){
tempRef = tempRef.offsetParent;
referTop += tempRef.offsetTop;
}
el.style.top = referTop + topOff;
}
// change the logging params to reflect which link was clicked
function setFL(href)
{
return href.replace("FL=top", itemFL);
}
// -->
</script>
<a href="#" class="back-to-top"></a>
<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function BrowserCheck() {
var b = navigator.appName;
if (b == "Netscape") this.b = "NS";
else if (b == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") this.b = "IE";
else this.b = b;
this.v = parseInt(navigator.appVersion);
this.NS = (this.b == "NS" && this.v>=4);
this.NS4 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 4);
this.NS5 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 5);
this.IE = (this.b == "IE" && this.v>=4);
this.IE4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 4')>0);
this.IE5 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 5')>0);
if (this.IE5 || this.NS5) this.VER5 = true;
if (this.IE4 || this.NS4) this.VER4 = true;
this.OLD = (! this.VER5 && ! this.VER4) ? true : false;
this.min = (this.NS||this.IE);
}
is = new BrowserCheck();
alertBox = (is.VER5) ? document.getElementById("alertLayer").style
: (is.NS) ? document.layers["alertLayer"]
: document.all["alertLayer"].style;
$(document).ready(function() {
if (mapable==true){
$("#myMap").css("position", "relative");
$("#myMap").css('border-bottom', '6px solid #677580');
}else{
$("#myMap").css("position", "absolute");
$("#myMap").css('border', 0 +'px');
}
var offset = 220;
var duration = 10;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
} else {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
}
});
jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
jQuery('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
return false;
})
});
function concatState(str) {
var res = str.substring(0, str.indexOf(',')).replace('<h2','<div').replace('</h2>','</div>');
  return res;
}
var city = $("#cityState").html();
var search = $("#catid").html()
document.getElementById("cityonly").innerHTML = concatState(city)+ " ";
</script>

$( ".hidefilters" ).click(function() {
if(document.getElementById("hf").innerHTML =='Hide Filters'){
document.getElementById("hf").innerHTML = 'Sort Filters'
}
else{
document.getElementById("hf").innerHTML = 'Hide Filters'}
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function getfeatures(id,mp,yextTagId, listingNumber) {
var hc = false;
var inx = 0;
var yextTagDivArray = $("div[id=yext-tag" + yextTagId+"]");
//var yextag = $("#yext-tag" + id).clone();
var yextag = $(yextTagDivArray[0]).clone();
var features = $("<div class='coupons'></div>");
if(id != 0){
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1){
var morefeat = $("#mofe" + id).clone();
features = $(features).append($("#fl" + id).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon" + id) || $(this).is("#of" + id))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){ $("#dmf" + id).remove(); }
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
}else{
/* when pinTag value is not available for a listing,
at that mofe and f1 div is not renedering with proper id in listingpage.links.jsf.
For that reason it's require to retrieve mofe and f1 div as a children of mpbtm div.
*/
var morefeat = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#mofe");
var fl = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#fl");
features = $(features).append($(fl).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon") || $(this).is("#of"))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){
$("#dmf" + (listingNumber+1)).remove();
}
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
if(yextag){
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("margin","4px 0 0 0");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("float","left");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("display","block");
$(".yextall",yextag).css("display","none");
$(".yexttrim",yextag).css("display","block");
$(yextag.html()).prependTo($(features));
}
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1 || yextag){
return features.html();
} else {
return;
}
}
function gbplc(id) {
//console.log("enter gbplc id: " + id);
var fltp = 2;
var clone = $(".pin" + id).clone();
if (clone) {
var text = $('.detailName',clone).text();
var charsLength = text.length;
var adds = $(".address",clone).html();
var moreInfo = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('onclick');
var mInfohref = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('href');
$(".listResults",clone).after("<div class='addressDetails'>"+adds+"</div>");
$(".vlst",clone).after("<p style='float:left;padding-top:15px;clear:both'><a onclick='"+moreInfo+"'" + " href='"+mInfohref+"'>More Info</a></p>");
//console.info(adds);
$(".address",clone).remove();
$(".yext-tag",clone).remove();
$("#reviewimagediv",clone).remove();
$(".reviewtext1",clone).remove();
$(".links",clone).remove();
$(".icons",clone).remove();
$(".business-text",clone).remove();
$(".phone",clone).remove();
$(".listingNumber",clone).remove();
var bush = $('.detailName',clone).width();
var addh = $('.address',clone).outerHeight();
var rewh = (bush + addh) + 2;
$(".addressDetails",clone).css("top", bush + "px");
$("#flyoutDiv .reviews",clone).css("top", rewh + "px");
}
var clnHtml = clone.html();
//console.log("clnHtml: " + clnHtml);
var trackingAttrWithMap = 'data-track=\'{\"inmap\":\"true\",';
if ($.browser.msie) {
var trackingAttr = new RegExp('data-track=\'{', 'g');
clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(trackingAttr, trackingAttrWithMap);
}
else {
var addMapIndEnd = '}\'';
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/data-track=\"{/g,trackingAttrWithMap);
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/}\"/g,addMapIndEnd);
}
return fltp + "spFlyoutType" + "<section class=\"listings\" style=\"width:auto;padding-bottom:0px;margin-bottom:0px;\"><article style=\"padding:0px;border-bottom:none;\">"+clnHtml + "</article></section>";
}
function hlListing(n) {
var a = document.getElementsByTagName("article");
for (var i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
var e = $(".atlist" + i);
if (e) {
if (n == i){
e.css("background-color","#DBEBF2");
} else {
e.css("background-color","");
}
}
}
}
$(document).ready( function() {
$(".pager a").click( function(e) {
s.prop41="Listing Results:Sort by:Pagination";
});
$("h3 a").rightClick( function(e) {
var nwurl = $("#rcurl" + $(this).attr('id')).attr("title");
if(nwurl!=null && nwurl!="null"){
$(this).attr("href", nwurl);
}
});
});
function loadMap(){
GetMap();
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function logBPClick(bidClickUrl, clickBase)
{
if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
} else {
tsrc = clickBase + bidClickUrl;
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
}
function timebplogClick(t) {
var img = new Image();
img.src = t;
}

function distLink () {
var rr=document.distance.RR.value;
var ppvalue = '';
if (rr == '0'){
ppvalue = "&PP=L";
}
var rrvalue = '';
if (rr != 'AA'){ rrvalue = '&local=on&RR='+rr; }
var urlaa='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&MCBP=true&F=1';
// Generate a distance sort link:
var url='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&EG=1&MCBP=true&OO=1&F=1'+rrvalue+ppvalue;
if (rr == 'AA'){ document.location.href=urlaa; } else{ document.location.href=url;}
}
</script>

<script language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>
<!--
var itemIDNumber=0;
var itemFL="FL=top";
// multiple links on the page may the same overlay div.
// these functions display/hide the overlay in a position relative to the links
// (the links are moreN and lessN, where N is itemNumber)
// and hide or show those links as appropriate
// we also sets up logging, so we can distinguish clicks on different links (by fl param)
function showListingsOverlay(itemNumber, fl)
{
// since we have a link to display this in multiple places, a user may scroll around
// and click from multiple places. so if overlay was already displayed - hide it and reset the link to display it
hideListingsOverlay();
// these two vars are defined above and are set here for use in closing!
itemIDNumber=itemNumber;
itemFL=fl;
var ref = document.getElementById('less'+itemIDNumber);
var div = document.getElementById('listingsOverlay');
// if we are at the top, display overlay just below the link
if (itemFL=='FL=top')
moveElement(div, ref, 20);
else {
// this is the link at the bottom, get the height and place the overlay just above the link
var myHeight = 40;
if (div.currentStyle) { //ie way
myHeight = div.offsetHeight;
}
if (window.getComputedStyle) { //mozilla way
var myElementCS = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(div, null);
myHeight = parseInt(myElementCS.getPropertyValue('height'));
}
moveElement(div, ref, -(myHeight));
}
overlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('less'+itemIDNumber);
showform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
}
function hideListingsOverlay()
{
hideoverlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
showform('less'+itemIDNumber);
}
function moveElement(el, ref, topOff)
{
var referTop = ref.offsetTop;
var tempRef = ref;
while(tempRef.offsetParent){
tempRef = tempRef.offsetParent;
referTop += tempRef.offsetTop;
}
el.style.top = referTop + topOff;
}
// change the logging params to reflect which link was clicked
function setFL(href)
{
return href.replace("FL=top", itemFL);
}
// -->
</script>
<a href="#" class="back-to-top"></a>
<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function BrowserCheck() {
var b = navigator.appName;
if (b == "Netscape") this.b = "NS";
else if (b == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") this.b = "IE";
else this.b = b;
this.v = parseInt(navigator.appVersion);
this.NS = (this.b == "NS" && this.v>=4);
this.NS4 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 4);
this.NS5 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 5);
this.IE = (this.b == "IE" && this.v>=4);
this.IE4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 4')>0);
this.IE5 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 5')>0);
if (this.IE5 || this.NS5) this.VER5 = true;
if (this.IE4 || this.NS4) this.VER4 = true;
this.OLD = (! this.VER5 && ! this.VER4) ? true : false;
this.min = (this.NS||this.IE);
}
is = new BrowserCheck();
alertBox = (is.VER5) ? document.getElementById("alertLayer").style
: (is.NS) ? document.layers["alertLayer"]
: document.all["alertLayer"].style;
$(document).ready(function() {
if (mapable==true){
$("#myMap").css("position", "relative");
$("#myMap").css('border-bottom', '6px solid #677580');
}else{
$("#myMap").css("position", "absolute");
$("#myMap").css('border', 0 +'px');
}
var offset = 220;
var duration = 10;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
} else {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
}
});
jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
jQuery('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
return false;
})
});
function concatState(str) {
var res = str.substring(0, str.indexOf(',')).replace('<h2','<div').replace('</h2>','</div>');
  return res;
}
var city = $("#cityState").html();
var search = $("#catid").html()
document.getElementById("cityonly").innerHTML = concatState(city)+ " ";
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function getfeatures(id,mp,yextTagId, listingNumber) {
var hc = false;
var inx = 0;
var yextTagDivArray = $("div[id=yext-tag" + yextTagId+"]");
//var yextag = $("#yext-tag" + id).clone();
var yextag = $(yextTagDivArray[0]).clone();
var features = $("<div class='coupons'></div>");
if(id != 0){
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1){
var morefeat = $("#mofe" + id).clone();
features = $(features).append($("#fl" + id).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon" + id) || $(this).is("#of" + id))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){ $("#dmf" + id).remove(); }
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
}else{
/* when pinTag value is not available for a listing,
at that mofe and f1 div is not renedering with proper id in listingpage.links.jsf.
For that reason it's require to retrieve mofe and f1 div as a children of mpbtm div.
*/
var morefeat = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#mofe");
var fl = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#fl");
features = $(features).append($(fl).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon") || $(this).is("#of"))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){
$("#dmf" + (listingNumber+1)).remove();
}
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
if(yextag){
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("margin","4px 0 0 0");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("float","left");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("display","block");
$(".yextall",yextag).css("display","none");
$(".yexttrim",yextag).css("display","block");
$(yextag.html()).prependTo($(features));
}
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1 || yextag){
return features.html();
} else {
return;
}
}
function gbplc(id) {
//console.log("enter gbplc id: " + id);
var fltp = 2;
var clone = $(".pin" + id).clone();
if (clone) {
var text = $('.detailName',clone).text();
var charsLength = text.length;
var adds = $(".address",clone).html();
var moreInfo = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('onclick');
var mInfohref = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('href');
$(".listResults",clone).after("<div class='addressDetails'>"+adds+"</div>");
$(".vlst",clone).after("<p style='float:left;padding-top:15px;clear:both'><a onclick='"+moreInfo+"'" + " href='"+mInfohref+"'>More Info</a></p>");
//console.info(adds);
$(".address",clone).remove();
$(".yext-tag",clone).remove();
$("#reviewimagediv",clone).remove();
$(".reviewtext1",clone).remove();
$(".links",clone).remove();
$(".icons",clone).remove();
$(".business-text",clone).remove();
$(".phone",clone).remove();
$(".listingNumber",clone).remove();
var bush = $('.detailName',clone).width();
var addh = $('.address',clone).outerHeight();
var rewh = (bush + addh) + 2;
$(".addressDetails",clone).css("top", bush + "px");
$("#flyoutDiv .reviews",clone).css("top", rewh + "px");
}
var clnHtml = clone.html();
//console.log("clnHtml: " + clnHtml);
var trackingAttrWithMap = 'data-track=\'{\"inmap\":\"true\",';
if ($.browser.msie) {
var trackingAttr = new RegExp('data-track=\'{', 'g');
clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(trackingAttr, trackingAttrWithMap);
}
else {
var addMapIndEnd = '}\'';
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/data-track=\"{/g,trackingAttrWithMap);
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/}\"/g,addMapIndEnd);
}
return fltp + "spFlyoutType" + "<section class=\"listings\" style=\"width:auto;padding-bottom:0px;margin-bottom:0px;\"><article style=\"padding:0px;border-bottom:none;\">"+clnHtml + "</article></section>";
}
function hlListing(n) {
var a = document.getElementsByTagName("article");
for (var i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
var e = $(".atlist" + i);
if (e) {
if (n == i){
e.css("background-color","#DBEBF2");
} else {
e.css("background-color","");
}
}
}
}

<script type="text/javascript">
function logBPClick(bidClickUrl, clickBase)
{
if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
} else {
tsrc = clickBase + bidClickUrl;
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
}
function timebplogClick(t) {
var img = new Image();
img.src = t;
}

function verifySimple(f) {
if(f == null) {
f = document.ypform;
}
if(f.C) {
var keywd = f.C.value;
keywd = keywd.replace( /^\s+/g, "" );
keywd = keywd.replace( /\s+$/g, "" );
if(f.N == null && (keywd == "" || keywd == "Required field") || keywd == "Find local businesses e.g. hotels, Dallas TX") {
f.C.value = "Required field";
f.C.style.color = "red";
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
}
if ((f.C && f.N) && (f.C.value == "" && f.N.value == "")) {
alert("Please enter a Keyword or a Business Name.");
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
return true;
}

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}

}

resizeSearch();
});

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function distLink () {
var rr=document.distance.RR.value;
var ppvalue = '';
if (rr == '0'){
ppvalue = "&PP=L";
}
var rrvalue = '';
if (rr != 'AA'){ rrvalue = '&local=on&RR='+rr; }
var urlaa='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&MCBP=true&F=1';
// Generate a distance sort link:
var url='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&EG=1&MCBP=true&OO=1&F=1'+rrvalue+ppvalue;
if (rr == 'AA'){ document.location.href=urlaa; } else{ document.location.href=url;}
}
</script>
<form id="iehide1" name="distance" class="sortform3">
<select id="searchwithin" name="RR" data-trackchg='{"title":"Chg Mileage","tag":"searchwithin"}' onChange="distLink();">
<option value="AA" >All Areas</option>
<option value="0" >Santa Maria CA 93455</option>

$( ".more").click(function () {
if ( $( "#categorymodal" ).is( ":hidden" ) ) {
$( "#categorymodal" ).slideDown( "fast" );
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
$("#changecity").hide();
} else {
$( "#categorymodal" ).hide();
}
});

if ($("#categorymodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#categorymodal").hide();
}
if ($("#nhoodmodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
}
});
$(".changecityStyle").click(function () {
if ($("#categorymodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#categorymodal").hide();
}
if ($("#nhoodmodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
}
});

<script language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>
<!--
var itemIDNumber=0;
var itemFL="FL=top";
// multiple links on the page may the same overlay div.
// these functions display/hide the overlay in a position relative to the links
// (the links are moreN and lessN, where N is itemNumber)
// and hide or show those links as appropriate
// we also sets up logging, so we can distinguish clicks on different links (by fl param)
function showListingsOverlay(itemNumber, fl)
{
// since we have a link to display this in multiple places, a user may scroll around
// and click from multiple places. so if overlay was already displayed - hide it and reset the link to display it
hideListingsOverlay();
// these two vars are defined above and are set here for use in closing!
itemIDNumber=itemNumber;
itemFL=fl;
var ref = document.getElementById('less'+itemIDNumber);
var div = document.getElementById('listingsOverlay');
// if we are at the top, display overlay just below the link
if (itemFL=='FL=top')
moveElement(div, ref, 20);
else {
// this is the link at the bottom, get the height and place the overlay just above the link
var myHeight = 40;
if (div.currentStyle) { //ie way
myHeight = div.offsetHeight;
}
if (window.getComputedStyle) { //mozilla way
var myElementCS = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(div, null);
myHeight = parseInt(myElementCS.getPropertyValue('height'));
}
moveElement(div, ref, -(myHeight));
}
overlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('less'+itemIDNumber);
showform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
}
function hideListingsOverlay()
{
hideoverlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
showform('less'+itemIDNumber);
}
function moveElement(el, ref, topOff)
{
var referTop = ref.offsetTop;
var tempRef = ref;
while(tempRef.offsetParent){
tempRef = tempRef.offsetParent;
referTop += tempRef.offsetTop;
}
el.style.top = referTop + topOff;
}
// change the logging params to reflect which link was clicked
function setFL(href)
{
return href.replace("FL=top", itemFL);
}
// -->
</script>

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function BrowserCheck() {
var b = navigator.appName;
if (b == "Netscape") this.b = "NS";
else if (b == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") this.b = "IE";
else this.b = b;
this.v = parseInt(navigator.appVersion);
this.NS = (this.b == "NS" && this.v>=4);
this.NS4 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 4);
this.NS5 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 5);
this.IE = (this.b == "IE" && this.v>=4);
this.IE4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 4')>0);
this.IE5 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 5')>0);
if (this.IE5 || this.NS5) this.VER5 = true;
if (this.IE4 || this.NS4) this.VER4 = true;
this.OLD = (! this.VER5 && ! this.VER4) ? true : false;
this.min = (this.NS||this.IE);
}
is = new BrowserCheck();
alertBox = (is.VER5) ? document.getElementById("alertLayer").style
: (is.NS) ? document.layers["alertLayer"]
: document.all["alertLayer"].style;
$(document).ready(function() {
if (mapable==true){
$("#myMap").css("position", "relative");
$("#myMap").css('border-bottom', '6px solid #677580');
}else{
$("#myMap").css("position", "absolute");
$("#myMap").css('border', 0 +'px');
}
var offset = 220;
var duration = 10;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
} else {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
}
});
jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
jQuery('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
return false;
})
});
function concatState(str) {
var res = str.substring(0, str.indexOf(',')).replace('<h2','<div').replace('</h2>','</div>');
  return res;
}
var city = $("#cityState").html();
var search = $("#catid").html()
document.getElementById("cityonly").innerHTML = concatState(city)+ " ";
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function getfeatures(id,mp,yextTagId, listingNumber) {
var hc = false;
var inx = 0;
var yextTagDivArray = $("div[id=yext-tag" + yextTagId+"]");
//var yextag = $("#yext-tag" + id).clone();
var yextag = $(yextTagDivArray[0]).clone();
var features = $("<div class='coupons'></div>");
if(id != 0){
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1){
var morefeat = $("#mofe" + id).clone();
features = $(features).append($("#fl" + id).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon" + id) || $(this).is("#of" + id))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){ $("#dmf" + id).remove(); }
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
}else{
/* when pinTag value is not available for a listing,
at that mofe and f1 div is not renedering with proper id in listingpage.links.jsf.
For that reason it's require to retrieve mofe and f1 div as a children of mpbtm div.
*/
var morefeat = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#mofe");
var fl = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#fl");
features = $(features).append($(fl).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon") || $(this).is("#of"))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){
$("#dmf" + (listingNumber+1)).remove();
}
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
if(yextag){
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("margin","4px 0 0 0");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("float","left");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("display","block");
$(".yextall",yextag).css("display","none");
$(".yexttrim",yextag).css("display","block");
$(yextag.html()).prependTo($(features));
}
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1 || yextag){
return features.html();
} else {
return;
}
}
function gbplc(id) {
//console.log("enter gbplc id: " + id);
var fltp = 2;
var clone = $(".pin" + id).clone();
if (clone) {
var text = $('.detailName',clone).text();
var charsLength = text.length;
var adds = $(".address",clone).html();
var moreInfo = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('onclick');
var mInfohref = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('href');
$(".listResults",clone).after("<div class='addressDetails'>"+adds+"</div>");
$(".vlst",clone).after("<p style='float:left;padding-top:15px;clear:both'><a onclick='"+moreInfo+"'" + " href='"+mInfohref+"'>More Info</a></p>");
//console.info(adds);
$(".address",clone).remove();
$(".yext-tag",clone).remove();
$("#reviewimagediv",clone).remove();
$(".reviewtext1",clone).remove();
$(".links",clone).remove();
$(".icons",clone).remove();
$(".business-text",clone).remove();
$(".phone",clone).remove();
$(".listingNumber",clone).remove();
var bush = $('.detailName',clone).width();
var addh = $('.address',clone).outerHeight();
var rewh = (bush + addh) + 2;
$(".addressDetails",clone).css("top", bush + "px");
$("#flyoutDiv .reviews",clone).css("top", rewh + "px");
}
var clnHtml = clone.html();
//console.log("clnHtml: " + clnHtml);
var trackingAttrWithMap = 'data-track=\'{\"inmap\":\"true\",';
if ($.browser.msie) {
var trackingAttr = new RegExp('data-track=\'{', 'g');
clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(trackingAttr, trackingAttrWithMap);
}
else {
var addMapIndEnd = '}\'';
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/data-track=\"{/g,trackingAttrWithMap);
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/}\"/g,addMapIndEnd);
}
return fltp + "spFlyoutType" + "<section class=\"listings\" style=\"width:auto;padding-bottom:0px;margin-bottom:0px;\"><article style=\"padding:0px;border-bottom:none;\">"+clnHtml + "</article></section>";
}
function hlListing(n) {
var a = document.getElementsByTagName("article");
for (var i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
var e = $(".atlist" + i);
if (e) {
if (n == i){
e.css("background-color","#DBEBF2");
} else {
e.css("background-color","");
}
}
}
}

if(nwurl!=null && nwurl!="null"){
$(this).attr("href", nwurl);
}
});
});

<script type="text/javascript">
function logBPClick(bidClickUrl, clickBase)
{
if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
} else {
tsrc = clickBase + bidClickUrl;
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
}
function timebplogClick(t) {
var img = new Image();
img.src = t;
}

<!--
function verifySimple(f) {
if(f == null) {
f = document.ypform;
}
if(f.C) {
var keywd = f.C.value;
keywd = keywd.replace( /^\s+/g, "" );
keywd = keywd.replace( /\s+$/g, "" );
if(f.N == null && (keywd == "" || keywd == "Required field") || keywd == "Find local businesses e.g. hotels, Dallas TX") {
f.C.value = "Required field";
f.C.style.color = "red";
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
}
if ((f.C && f.N) && (f.C.value == "" && f.N.value == "")) {
alert("Please enter a Keyword or a Business Name.");
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
return true;
}
//-->

<!-- <script>
function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
$(document).ready( function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});
</script> -->

function distLink () {
var rr=document.distance.RR.value;
var ppvalue = '';
if (rr == '0'){
ppvalue = "&PP=L";
}
var rrvalue = '';
if (rr != 'AA'){ rrvalue = '&local=on&RR='+rr; }
var urlaa='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&MCBP=true&F=1';
// Generate a distance sort link:
var url='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&EG=1&MCBP=true&OO=1&F=1'+rrvalue+ppvalue;
if (rr == 'AA'){ document.location.href=urlaa; } else{ document.location.href=url;}
}
</script>

<script language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>
<!--
var itemIDNumber=0;
var itemFL="FL=top";
// multiple links on the page may the same overlay div.
// these functions display/hide the overlay in a position relative to the links
// (the links are moreN and lessN, where N is itemNumber)
// and hide or show those links as appropriate
// we also sets up logging, so we can distinguish clicks on different links (by fl param)
function showListingsOverlay(itemNumber, fl)
{
// since we have a link to display this in multiple places, a user may scroll around
// and click from multiple places. so if overlay was already displayed - hide it and reset the link to display it
hideListingsOverlay();
// these two vars are defined above and are set here for use in closing!
itemIDNumber=itemNumber;
itemFL=fl;
var ref = document.getElementById('less'+itemIDNumber);
var div = document.getElementById('listingsOverlay');
// if we are at the top, display overlay just below the link
if (itemFL=='FL=top')
moveElement(div, ref, 20);
else {
// this is the link at the bottom, get the height and place the overlay just above the link
var myHeight = 40;
if (div.currentStyle) { //ie way
myHeight = div.offsetHeight;
}
if (window.getComputedStyle) { //mozilla way
var myElementCS = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(div, null);
myHeight = parseInt(myElementCS.getPropertyValue('height'));
}
moveElement(div, ref, -(myHeight));
}
overlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('less'+itemIDNumber);
showform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
}
function hideListingsOverlay()
{
hideoverlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
showform('less'+itemIDNumber);
}
function moveElement(el, ref, topOff)
{
var referTop = ref.offsetTop;
var tempRef = ref;
while(tempRef.offsetParent){
tempRef = tempRef.offsetParent;
referTop += tempRef.offsetTop;
}
el.style.top = referTop + topOff;
}
// change the logging params to reflect which link was clicked
function setFL(href)
{
return href.replace("FL=top", itemFL);
}
// -->
</script>

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function BrowserCheck() {
var b = navigator.appName;
if (b == "Netscape") this.b = "NS";
else if (b == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") this.b = "IE";
else this.b = b;
this.v = parseInt(navigator.appVersion);
this.NS = (this.b == "NS" && this.v>=4);
this.NS4 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 4);
this.NS5 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 5);
this.IE = (this.b == "IE" && this.v>=4);
this.IE4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 4')>0);
this.IE5 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 5')>0);
if (this.IE5 || this.NS5) this.VER5 = true;
if (this.IE4 || this.NS4) this.VER4 = true;
this.OLD = (! this.VER5 && ! this.VER4) ? true : false;
this.min = (this.NS||this.IE);
}
is = new BrowserCheck();
alertBox = (is.VER5) ? document.getElementById("alertLayer").style
: (is.NS) ? document.layers["alertLayer"]
: document.all["alertLayer"].style;
$(document).ready(function() {
if (mapable==true){
$("#myMap").css("position", "relative");
$("#myMap").css('border-bottom', '6px solid #677580');
}else{
$("#myMap").css("position", "absolute");
$("#myMap").css('border', 0 +'px');
}
var offset = 220;
var duration = 10;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
} else {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
}
});
jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
jQuery('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
return false;
})
});
function concatState(str) {
var res = str.substring(0, str.indexOf(',')).replace('<h2','<div').replace('</h2>','</div>');
  return res;
}
var city = $("#cityState").html();
var search = $("#catid").html()
document.getElementById("cityonly").innerHTML = concatState(city)+ " ";
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
/* returns the value of the name cookie */
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
}
</script>

function getfeatures(id,mp,yextTagId, listingNumber) {
var hc = false;
var inx = 0;
var yextTagDivArray = $("div[id=yext-tag" + yextTagId+"]");
//var yextag = $("#yext-tag" + id).clone();
var yextag = $(yextTagDivArray[0]).clone();
var features = $("<div class='coupons'></div>");
if(id != 0){
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1){
var morefeat = $("#mofe" + id).clone();
features = $(features).append($("#fl" + id).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon" + id) || $(this).is("#of" + id))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){ $("#dmf" + id).remove(); }
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
}else{
/* when pinTag value is not available for a listing,
at that mofe and f1 div is not renedering with proper id in listingpage.links.jsf.
For that reason it's require to retrieve mofe and f1 div as a children of mpbtm div.
*/
var morefeat = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#mofe");
var fl = $("#mpbtm" + listingNumber).children("div.coupons").children("#fl");
features = $(features).append($(fl).clone());
$('li',features).each(function(index) {
inx = index + 1;
if((yextag.length == 1 && morefeat)){ hc=true; }
if ($(this).is("#coupon") || $(this).is("#of"))
{
$(this).css("float","left"); $(this).css("display","block"); $(this).css("margin-left","-2px"); hc=true;
} else { $(this).remove(); }
});
if(inx > 0){ fltp = 3; }
if(morefeat && mp!=1){
$(morefeat.html()).appendTo($(features));
}
if(!hc && !yextag){
$("#dmf" + (listingNumber+1)).remove();
}
$(".feature-links",features).css("margin","0");
$(".feature-links",features).css("padding","0");
}
if(yextag){
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("margin","4px 0 0 0");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("float","left");
$(".yext-t",yextag).css("display","block");
$(".yextall",yextag).css("display","none");
$(".yexttrim",yextag).css("display","block");
$(yextag.html()).prependTo($(features));
}
if($("#fl" + id).length == 1 || yextag){
return features.html();
} else {
return;
}
}
function gbplc(id) {
//console.log("enter gbplc id: " + id);
var fltp = 2;
var clone = $(".pin" + id).clone();
if (clone) {
var text = $('.detailName',clone).text();
var charsLength = text.length;
var adds = $(".address",clone).html();
var moreInfo = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('onclick');
var mInfohref = $(".vlst",clone).find('.listResults:first a').attr('href');
$(".listResults",clone).after("<div class='addressDetails'>"+adds+"</div>");
$(".vlst",clone).after("<p style='float:left;padding-top:15px;clear:both'><a onclick='"+moreInfo+"'" + " href='"+mInfohref+"'>More Info</a></p>");
//console.info(adds);
$(".address",clone).remove();
$(".yext-tag",clone).remove();
$("#reviewimagediv",clone).remove();
$(".reviewtext1",clone).remove();
$(".links",clone).remove();
$(".icons",clone).remove();
$(".business-text",clone).remove();
$(".phone",clone).remove();
$(".listingNumber",clone).remove();
var bush = $('.detailName',clone).width();
var addh = $('.address',clone).outerHeight();
var rewh = (bush + addh) + 2;
$(".addressDetails",clone).css("top", bush + "px");
$("#flyoutDiv .reviews",clone).css("top", rewh + "px");
}
var clnHtml = clone.html();
//console.log("clnHtml: " + clnHtml);
var trackingAttrWithMap = 'data-track=\'{\"inmap\":\"true\",';
if ($.browser.msie) {
var trackingAttr = new RegExp('data-track=\'{', 'g');
clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(trackingAttr, trackingAttrWithMap);
}
else {
var addMapIndEnd = '}\'';
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/data-track=\"{/g,trackingAttrWithMap);
//clnHtml = clnHtml.replace(/}\"/g,addMapIndEnd);
}
return fltp + "spFlyoutType" + "<section class=\"listings\" style=\"width:auto;padding-bottom:0px;margin-bottom:0px;\"><article style=\"padding:0px;border-bottom:none;\">"+clnHtml + "</article></section>";
}
function hlListing(n) {
var a = document.getElementsByTagName("article");
for (var i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
var e = $(".atlist" + i);
if (e) {
if (n == i){
e.css("background-color","#DBEBF2");
} else {
e.css("background-color","");
}
}
}
}
$(document).ready( function() {
$(".pager a").click( function(e) {
s.prop41="Listing Results:Sort by:Pagination";
});
$("h3 a").rightClick( function(e) {
var nwurl = $("#rcurl" + $(this).attr('id')).attr("title");
if(nwurl!=null && nwurl!="null"){
$(this).attr("href", nwurl);
}
});
});

<script type="text/javascript">
function logBPClick(bidClickUrl, clickBase)
{
if(bidClickUrl == 0) {
tsrc = clickBase + "http://img.superpages.com/images-yp/images/pixel_none.gif";
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
} else {
tsrc = clickBase + bidClickUrl;
setTimeout("timebplogClick(tsrc)",10);
}
}
function timebplogClick(t) {
var img = new Image();
img.src = t;
}
</script>

function verifySimple(f) {
if(f == null) {
f = document.ypform;
}
if(f.C) {
var keywd = f.C.value;
keywd = keywd.replace( /^\s+/g, "" );
keywd = keywd.replace( /\s+$/g, "" );
if(f.N == null && (keywd == "" || keywd == "Required field") || keywd == "Find local businesses e.g. hotels, Dallas TX") {
f.C.value = "Required field";
f.C.style.color = "red";
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
}
if ((f.C && f.N) && (f.C.value == "" && f.N.value == "")) {
alert("Please enter a Keyword or a Business Name.");
f.C.focus();
return false;
}
return true;
}

function resizeSearch() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input').width('50%');
return;
}
var usedWidth = 0;
$('.navbar .navbar-nav, .navbar .navbar-header').each(function (i, v) {
usedWidth += $(v).outerWidth();
});
var navWidth = $('.navbar .navbar-header').parent().outerWidth();
var availWidth = navWidth - usedWidth - 120;
var navSearchWidth = $('.navbar-form').outerWidth();
if (availWidth > 450) {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(450);
}
else {
$('.navbar .navbar-form input, .autocomplete').width(availWidth);
}
;
}
$(window).on('resize', function (e) {
resizeSearch();
});

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function distLink () {
var rr=document.distance.RR.value;
var ppvalue = '';
if (rr == '0'){
ppvalue = "&PP=L";
}
var rrvalue = '';
if (rr != 'AA'){ rrvalue = '&local=on&RR='+rr; }
var urlaa='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&MCBP=true&F=1';
// Generate a distance sort link:
var url='http://yellowpages.superpages.com/listings.jsp?C=Beauty+Salons+near+93455&CTS=Beauty+Salons&R=D&EG=1&MCBP=true&OO=1&F=1'+rrvalue+ppvalue;
if (rr == 'AA'){ document.location.href=urlaa; } else{ document.location.href=url;}
}
</script>
<form id="iehide1" name="distance" class="sortform3">
<select id="searchwithin" name="RR" data-trackchg='{"title":"Chg Mileage","tag":"searchwithin"}' onChange="distLink();">
<option value="AA" >All Areas</option>
<option value="0" >Santa Maria CA 93455</option>
<option value="5" >5 miles</option>
<option value="10" >10 miles</option>
<option value="15" >15 miles</option>

$( ".more").click(function () {
if ( $( "#categorymodal" ).is( ":hidden" ) ) {
$( "#categorymodal" ).slideDown( "fast" );
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
$("#changecity").hide();
} else {
$( "#categorymodal" ).hide();
}
});

if ($("#categorymodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#categorymodal").hide();
}
if ($("#nhoodmodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
}
});
$(".changecityStyle").click(function () {
if ($("#categorymodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#categorymodal").hide();
}
if ($("#nhoodmodal").not(":hidden")) {
$("#nhoodmodal").hide();
}
});

function logClick(bidClickUrl, listingClickInfo, clickType,clkTracker,adOrCampaign)
{
var img = new Image();
var d = new Date();

} else {
//alert("In the bidClick tracking function");
tsrc = s_clickBase + bidClickUrl;
}
setTimeout("timelogClick(tsrc)",10);
}

var clickLoc = u + "&" + lt;
img.src = clickLoc;

<script type="text/javascript">
var rand=0;
$( ".logo" ).each(function( i ) {
if($(this).children('.slider').length >0){
$(this).find(".dimg").hide();
}
if($(this).children('.urltoicon').length >0){
$(this).find(".dimg").hide();
} else{ rand++;
/* var rand =Math.floor(Math.random()*(10-1)+1);
console.log('rand::'+rand); */
/* console.log('rand::'+rand); */
if(rand==1){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg0");
}
if(rand==2){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg1");
}
if(rand==3){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg2");
}
if(rand==4){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg3");
}
if(rand==5){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg4");
}
if(rand==6){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg5");
}
if(rand==7){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg6");
}
if(rand==8){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg7");
}
if(rand==9){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg8");
}
if(rand==10){
$(this).find(".dimg").removeClass("dimg").addClass("dimg9");
rand=0;
}
}
});

<script language=JavaScript type=text/javascript>
<!--
var itemIDNumber=0;
var itemFL="FL=top";
// multiple links on the page may the same overlay div.
// these functions display/hide the overlay in a position relative to the links
// (the links are moreN and lessN, where N is itemNumber)
// and hide or show those links as appropriate
// we also sets up logging, so we can distinguish clicks on different links (by fl param)
function showListingsOverlay(itemNumber, fl)
{
// since we have a link to display this in multiple places, a user may scroll around
// and click from multiple places. so if overlay was already displayed - hide it and reset the link to display it
hideListingsOverlay();
// these two vars are defined above and are set here for use in closing!
itemIDNumber=itemNumber;
itemFL=fl;
var ref = document.getElementById('less'+itemIDNumber);
var div = document.getElementById('listingsOverlay');
// if we are at the top, display overlay just below the link
if (itemFL=='FL=top')
moveElement(div, ref, 20);
else {
// this is the link at the bottom, get the height and place the overlay just above the link
var myHeight = 40;
if (div.currentStyle) { //ie way
myHeight = div.offsetHeight;
}
if (window.getComputedStyle) { //mozilla way
var myElementCS = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(div, null);
myHeight = parseInt(myElementCS.getPropertyValue('height'));
}
moveElement(div, ref, -(myHeight));
}
overlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('less'+itemIDNumber);
showform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
}
function hideListingsOverlay()
{
hideoverlay('listingsOverlay');
hideform('dvmore'+itemIDNumber);
showform('less'+itemIDNumber);
}
function moveElement(el, ref, topOff)
{
var referTop = ref.offsetTop;
var tempRef = ref;
while(tempRef.offsetParent){
tempRef = tempRef.offsetParent;
referTop += tempRef.offsetTop;
}
el.style.top = referTop + topOff;
}
// change the logging params to reflect which link was clicked
function setFL(href)
{
return href.replace("FL=top", itemFL);
}
// -->
</script>
<a href="#" class="back-to-top"></a>
<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
function BrowserCheck() {
var b = navigator.appName;
if (b == "Netscape") this.b = "NS";
else if (b == "Microsoft Internet Explorer") this.b = "IE";
else this.b = b;
this.v = parseInt(navigator.appVersion);
this.NS = (this.b == "NS" && this.v>=4);
this.NS4 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 4);
this.NS5 = (this.b == "NS" && this.v == 5);
this.IE = (this.b == "IE" && this.v>=4);
this.IE4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 4')>0);
this.IE5 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE 5')>0);
if (this.IE5 || this.NS5) this.VER5 = true;
if (this.IE4 || this.NS4) this.VER4 = true;
this.OLD = (! this.VER5 && ! this.VER4) ? true : false;
this.min = (this.NS||this.IE);
}
is = new BrowserCheck();
alertBox = (is.VER5) ? document.getElementById("alertLayer").style
: (is.NS) ? document.layers["alertLayer"]
: document.all["alertLayer"].style;
$(document).ready(function() {
if (mapable==true){
$("#myMap").css("position", "relative");
$("#myMap").css('border-bottom', '6px solid #677580');
}else{
$("#myMap").css("position", "absolute");
$("#myMap").css('border', 0 +'px');
}
var offset = 220;
var duration = 10;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
} else {
jQuery('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
}
});
jQuery('.back-to-top').click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
jQuery('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
return false;
})
});
function concatState(str) {
var res = str.substring(0, str.indexOf(',')).replace('<h2','<div').replace('</h2>','</div>');
  return res;
}
var city = $("#cityState").html();
var search = $("#catid").html()
document.getElementById("cityonly").innerHTML = concatState(city)+ " ";
</script>
